changelog_entries.title: Implement storyboard sample playback
changelog_entries.message_html: Implements storyboard samples for keysounded maps. Keysounds are not completely implemented yet - that will come with a future implementation.

changelog_entries.title: Remove migration log output
Change osu!standard default key bindings
changelog_entries.message_html: Defaults for new installs are now A/S instead of Z/X. These keys are better supported as "game" keys on some keyboards (being part of WASD) and also become keyboard layout agnostic (for most common layouts).

changelog_entries.title: Fix informational overlays not hiding when user toggles other overlay views
Make focused overlays block "select" and keys
changelog_entries.message_html: Fixes keys and actions transmitting behind the music controller and other overlays.

changelog_entries.title: Make arrow keys change settings at the lowest possible intervals
changelog_entries.message_html: For maximum precision.

changelog_entries.message_html: Tooltips should display faster if the tooltip is already partly visible. This regressed with the addition of custon AppearDelay.

changelog_entries.title: Fix more instances of osu!mania beatmap conversion failing
changelog_entries.message_html:
Fixes various instances where mania's beatmap conversion differed from osu!stable:

  1. Stair patterns were never generated due to missing initialisation.
    • There were also off-by-one cases when the stair type was switched too early.
  2. Spinner/slider density/generated notes were never recorded.
  3. "Gathered" (clustered) notes were generated more frequently on single-column jacks.
  4. Drain time was incorrectly computed as being rounded to the millisecond, rather than rounded to the second.

Also fixes the output of beatmap conversion tests when the mapping equality fails.

changelog_entries.title: Mark dependency-injected methods as implicitly-used
Correct minor typo in documentation
Manage state separately for each mouse button
changelog_entries.message_html: Allows for much better handling of events on a per-button level, which was previously not possible.

changelog_entries.title: Fix some possible null reference exceptions

changelog_entries.message_html: Adds a method in preparation for fullscreen multi-monitor support.

changelog_entries.title: Add support for multiple sample banks

changelog_entries.title: Always switch to timeline tab when switching beatmap
Add Project Loved: Week of July 1st news post
[CWC 2018] Finals Update
changelog_entries.message_html: Added schedule for the Finals, map pool and results. Updated bracket.

changelog_entries.title: Fix rulesets not loading in debug builds after running a release build
Dependency inject the mania column keybind
Extend BeatmapProcessor to allow processing hitobjects prior to ApplyDefaults
changelog_entries.message_html: Allows more flexibilty over how hitobjects are adjusted before and after their child objects are created and populated.

changelog_entries.title: Fix incorrect usages of null coalesce
changelog_entries.message_html: Its priority is lower than priority of other operators in its left part.

changelog_entries.title: Standardise handling of "Back" key binding
changelog_entries.message_html: The back action is now customisable from settings. It also handles in a more conformant way, game-wide, whether bound to a mouse button or a keyboard key.

changelog_entries.title: Fix background screens not supporting early-exit condition
changelog_entries.message_html: Fixes crashes when rapidly changing screens.

changelog_entries.title: Make BindableRuleset non-null
changelog_entries.message_html: Reduces error proneness of previously nulable field.

changelog_entries.title: Fix crash if the skin stored in the config doesn't exist anymore
changelog_entries.message_html: If the database fails to migrate, it's possible for the skin stored in the config to get out of sync with the skins present in the database, causing a crash at startup.

changelog_entries.title: Fix leaderboard showing placeholder briefly when entering song select
changelog_entries.message_html: The leaderboard area would briefly show "No scores" before song select was finished initialising, even if there were potentially scores to be fetched. No more.

changelog_entries.title: Add key bindings for scroll speed
changelog_entries.message_html: You can now customise the keys to adjust scroll speed in gameplay.

changelog_entries.title: Standardise input handling of popup dialogs
changelog_entries.message_html: Clicking outside of the popup will cancel it. Also cancelling always triggers the last button in the popup.

changelog_entries.title: Allow KeyBindingContainer actions to travel past PassThroughInputManagers
changelog_entries.message_html: Allows for global actions to be handled within previous inaccessible locations, such as gameplay implementations.

changelog_entries.title: Add typed exceptions for various failures that can occur on Screen operations

changelog_entries.message_html: Fixes keys not always being blocked by text boxes, leading to unexpected UI actions.
